Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders basic
Other Equity Adjustments: adjustments to additional paid in capital dividends in excess of retained earnings

Exercise of Stock Options: stock issued during period value new issues
Stock-Based Compensation: a p i c common stock activity net
adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value

Stock Repurchases: treasury stock value acquired cost method
__unmapped__: minority interest decrease from distributions to noncontrolling interest holders
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
net income loss attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest
noncontrolling interest distributions payable to noncontrolling interest holders
